<META gameId='VALIDATION_10_T' avatar='FROG'/>
<GAME_INFO>
Each round, you are given 20 coins.
Decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
At the end of the round, the pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
Communication is enabled.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the whole group.
Any message you send is shown to everyone before contributions.
</GAME_INFO>
# GAME STARTS

<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>

Reasoning: I will contribute 10 coins to the pot. This is a balanced approach, allowing me to test the group's willingness to cooperate while still retaining a significant portion of my coins. By contributing half, I can gauge the level of cooperation among the players without fully committing or being overly conservative.
